short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add gently falling snow to your webpage :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snow will add gently falling snow to any webpage with just a click. It brings winter spirit to your web browsing without being intrusive enough to distract or impair working with pages.
